name: Number 29: Mannequin Cat
text:
2 Level 2 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon it to your opponent's field. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field, while you control this monster (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 monster with the same Type or Attribute from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use this effect of "Number 29: Mannequin Cat" once per turn.
